body:
Hi;

I watched the"grid based analysis"film in youtube and understood about daylighting of

a single room that has a window on the ground floor.

but I have some questions:

1.How can I see the intensity of daylighting on the wall?

I mean,I want to see that result on wall that has no window. 

2.Is this result include just direct daylighting or include indirect daylighting too?

   Best Regards

replies.body: 1. Generate test points for the wall and not the floor. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pip6g4jx0sf*6dJCo-kn2hmdMIDDTfhxC3RAh-dfN4-WiBBV9bgk-Jd5Qi64HU-MMe8b1yqBTrU-JyqhzSUDpfk8vBx0bVkz/genTestPt.png) 2. It does include both.
